name: typed-bitwig-api
description: TypeScript definition file for the Bitwig Control Surface API.

scripts.build: jsdoc -d ./ -t ./ js-stubs && tsfmt -r bitwig-api.d.ts && prettier --parser typescript --print-width 100 --tab-width 4 --single-quote --trailing-comma=es5 --write bitwig-api.d.ts
scripts.version: npm run build && git add bitwig-api.d.ts

author: Joseph Larson
